items.content_html: A proof-of-concept project to compare the performances of Tauri (Rust) and React (Vite). UI designed with shadcn/ui, TailwindCSS and AceternityUI. Also, Zustand, a lightweight state management library, is used for state management.
items.title: sezRR/poc-tauri-vs-react: A proof-of-concept project to compare the performances of Tauri (Rust) and React (Vite). UI designed with shadcn/ui, TailwindCSS and AceternityUI. Also, Zustand, a lightweight state management library, is used for state management.

items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable starter kit for building TypeScript libraries. It comes with ESM support, flexible configuration options, extensive ESLint rules, and built-in Github Actions integration.
items.title: 2BAD/ts-lib-starter: A lightweight and customizable starter kit for building TypeScript libraries. It comes with ESM support, flexible configuration options, extensive ESLint rules, and built-in Github Actions integration.

items.content_html: A static website framework and vanilla JavaScript menu with associated HTML & CSS where you only have to adjust 3 height values in the JavaScript to add & remove menu & submenu items. Optionally integrates with Pure CSS framework. Responsive, mobile first & minimal/lightweight/fast!
items.title: cooperdozier/easy-em: A static website framework and vanilla JavaScript menu with associated HTML & CSS where you only have to adjust 3 height values in the JavaScript to add & remove menu & submenu items. Optionally integrates with Pure CSS framework. Responsive, mobile first & minimal/lightweight/fast!
